00028 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00029 {
00030    TTimeStamp timestamp;
00031 
00032    time_t gtime = time(0);
00033    tm     start_time = *localtime(&gtime);
00034 
00035    // Create all main (global) objects
00036    gAsymRoot = new AsymRoot();
00037 
00038    gAsymRoot->GetMeasConfigs(gMeasInfo, gAsymAnaInfo, gAnaMeasResult);
00039 
00040    AsymDbSql *gAsymDb = new AsymDbSql();
00041 
00042    gAsymAnaInfo->ProcessOptions(argc, argv);
00043    gAsymAnaInfo->VerifyOptions();
00044 
00045    // Book root file
00046    gAsymRoot->CreateRootFile(gAsymAnaInfo->GetRootFileName());
00047 
00048    MseMeasInfoX *mseMeasInfoX     = 0;
00049    MseMeasInfoX *mseMeasInfoXOrig = 0;
00050 
00051    // Check whether the measurement is already in database
00052    if (gAsymAnaInfo->fFlagUseDb) {
00053       mseMeasInfoX = gAsymDb->SelectRun(gMeasInfo->GetRunName());
00054    }
00055 
00056    if (mseMeasInfoX) { // If measurement found in database get its copy for later update with SQL
00057       mseMeasInfoXOrig  = new MseMeasInfoX(gMeasInfo->GetRunName());
00058       *mseMeasInfoXOrig = *mseMeasInfoX;
00059    } else {            // If measurement not found in database create a new object
00060       mseMeasInfoX = new MseMeasInfoX(gMeasInfo->GetRunName());
00061    }
00062 
00063    // Read data file into memory
00064    RawDataReader rawDataReader(gAsymAnaInfo->GetRawDataFileName());
00065 
00066    // Get basic information about the measurement from the data file
00067    // and overwrite the measurement info from database (MseMeasInfoX) if needed
00068    rawDataReader.ReadRecBegin(*mseMeasInfoX);
00069    rawDataReader.ReadMeasInfo(*mseMeasInfoX);
00070 
00071    MseRunPeriodX *mseRunPeriodX = 0;
00072 
00073    // We can do this for any run type including alpha runs
00074    if (gAsymAnaInfo->fFlagUseDb) {
00075       mseRunPeriodX = gAsymDb->CompleteMeasInfoByRunPeriod(*mseMeasInfoX);
00076    }
00077 
00078    if (!mseRunPeriodX) {
00079       mseRunPeriodX = new MseRunPeriodX();
00080    }
00081 
00082    // Overwrite the offline version (if set previously)
00083    mseMeasInfoX->asym_version = gAsymAnaInfo->fAsymVersion;
00084 
00085    // Update the final running parameters based on what was read from DB and
00086    // what was requested by the user
00087    gAsymAnaInfo->Update(*mseMeasInfoX);
00088    gMeasInfo->Update(*mseMeasInfoX);
00089    gMeasInfo->Update(*mseRunPeriodX);
00090    gMeasInfo->Update(*gAsymAnaInfo);  // Can override some parameters by the user ones
00091 
00092    if (!gMeasInfo->HasMachineParamsInRawData())
00093    {
00094       opencdev::mean_result_t mean_value;
00095       double startTime = gMeasInfo->fStartTime;
00096       double endTime = gMeasInfo->fStopTime;
00097 
00098       if (endTime < startTime)
00099       {
00100           endTime = startTime + 600;
00101       }
00102 
00103       opencdev::LocalLogReader log_reader(gAsymAnaInfo->GetSlowControlLogDir());
00104       log_reader.query_timerange_mean("RHIC/Rf/Voltage_Monitor_StripChart", startTime, endTime, &mean_value);
00105       log_reader.query_timerange_mean("RHIC/PowerSupplies/rot-ps", startTime, endTime, &mean_value);
00106       log_reader.query_timerange_mean("RHIC/PowerSupplies/snake-ps", startTime, endTime, &mean_value);
00107 
00108       for(opencdev::mean_result_t::const_iterator it = mean_value.begin(); it != mean_value.end(); it++)
00109       {
00110          const string &key = it->first;
00111          double value = it->second;
00112 
00113          Info("asym", "Mean %s equals to %f", key.c_str(), value);
00114       }
00115 
00116       RecordMachineParams machineParams;
00117       machineParams.fCavity197MHzVoltage[0]   = mean_value["cavTuneLoop.4a-rf-b197-1.3:probeMagInVoltsScaledM:value[0]"];
00118       machineParams.fCavity197MHzVoltage[1]   = mean_value["cavTuneLoop.4a-rf-y197-1.3:probeMagInVoltsScaledM:value[0]"];
00119       machineParams.fSnakeCurrents[0]         = mean_value["bo3-snk7-outer"];
00120       machineParams.fSnakeCurrents[1]         = mean_value["yi3-snk7-outer"];
00121       machineParams.fStarRotatorCurrents[0]   = mean_value["bi5-rot3-outer"];
00122       machineParams.fStarRotatorCurrents[1]   = mean_value["yo5-rot3-outer"];
00123       machineParams.fPhenixRotatorCurrents[0] = mean_value["bo7-rot3-outer"];
00124       machineParams.fPhenixRotatorCurrents[1] = mean_value["yi7-rot3-outer"];
00125 
00126       gMeasInfo->SetMachineParams(machineParams);
00127    }
00128 
00129    // Print some information about the measurement for debugging
00130    gAsymAnaInfo->Print();
00131    gMeasInfo->Print();
00132    mseMeasInfoX->Print();
00133 
00134    // A Calibrator object holds calibration constants for individual channels.
00135    // It knows how to updated/calibrate them if requested by the user
00136    gAsymRoot->UpdateCalibrator();
00137 
00138    // Create trees if requested by user
00139    if (gAsymAnaInfo->fSaveTrees.any()) {
00140       gAsymRoot->CreateTrees();
00141    }
00142 
00143   printf("After CreateTrees()!!\n");
00144    // We need to do some pre-processing first to extract parameters from the
00145    // data. For example, rough estimates of the dead layer and t0 are needed to
00146    // set preliminary cuts.
00147 
00148    rawDataReader.ReadDataPassOne(*mseMeasInfoX);  // Fill primary histograms
00149    gAsymRoot->FillDerivedPassOne();         // Fill other histograms from the primary ones
00150    gAsymRoot->Calibrate();                  // Process all channel alpha peak. XXX May need to change call order
00151    gAsymRoot->PostFillPassOne();            // Make decisions based on hist content/data
00152 
00153    printf("After PostFillPassOne!\n");
00154 
00155    // PassTwo
00156    if ( !gAsymAnaInfo->HasAlphaBit() ) {
00157       gAsymRoot->PreFill();
00158 
00159       // Main event Loop
00160       rawDataReader.ReadDataPassTwo(*mseMeasInfoX);
00161 
00162       gAsymRoot->FillDerived();
00163       gAsymRoot->PostFill(*mseMeasInfoX);
00164    }
00165 
00166    // No data analysis is done beyond this point only bookkeeping
00167 
00168    gAsymAnaInfo->fAnaDateTime = timestamp.GetSec();
00169 
00170    string tmpSqlDateTime(19, ' ');
00171    strftime(&tmpSqlDateTime[0], 20, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", &start_time);
00172 
00173    mseMeasInfoX->ana_start_time   = mysqlpp::DateTime(tmpSqlDateTime);
00174    mseMeasInfoX->ana_duration     = UInt_t(gAsymAnaInfo->fAnaTimeReal);
00175    mseMeasInfoX->measurement_type = UInt_t(gMeasInfo->GetMeasType());
00176 
00177    if (gAsymAnaInfo->fFlagUpdateDb && gAsymAnaInfo->fSuffix.empty())
00178       gAsymDb->UpdateInsert(mseMeasInfoXOrig, mseMeasInfoX);
00179 
00180    gAsymRoot->fEventConfig->fMseMeasInfoX = mseMeasInfoX;
00181 
00182    if (gAsymAnaInfo->GetAnaInfoFile())
00183    {
00184       gAsymRoot->fEventConfig->PrintAsPhp(gAsymAnaInfo->GetAnaInfoFile());
00185       fclose(gAsymAnaInfo->GetAnaInfoFile());
00186    }
00187    if (gAsymAnaInfo->GetRunConfFile())
00188    {
00189       gAsymRoot->fEventConfig->PrintAsConfig(gAsymAnaInfo->GetRunConfFile());
00190       fclose(gAsymAnaInfo->GetRunConfFile());
00191    }
00192    gAsymAnaInfo->fFileMeasInfo = 0;
00193    gAsymAnaInfo->fFileRunConf  = 0;
00194 
00195    if (gAsymAnaInfo->HasGraphBit())
00196       gAsymRoot->SaveAs("^.*$", gAsymAnaInfo->GetImageDir());
00197 
00198    // Close ROOT file
00199    gAsymRoot->Finalize();
00200 
00201    delete gAsymRoot;
00202    delete gAsymDb;
00203 
00204    gAsymAnaInfo->CopyResults();
00205 
00206    return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00207 }
